It is hard to believe these strangely shaped Pokémon are truly living creatures. I’ve pointed out that the species’ many forms resemble writing from other lands; no one will take me seriously.
They seem to communicate among each other telepathically. They are always found stuck on walls.
Because the Pokémon is shaped like ancient writing, it is a huge mystery whether written language or _____ came first.
This Pokémon is shaped like ancient writing. It is a mystery as to which came first, the ancient writings or the various _____. Research into this topic is ongoing but nothing is known.
Shaped like ancient writing, it is a huge mystery whether language or _____ came first.
Its flat, thin body is always stuck on walls. Its shape appears to have some meaning.
When alone, nothing happens. However, if there are two or more, an odd power is said to emerge.
Their shapes look like hieroglyphs on ancient tablets. It is said that the two are somehow related.
This Pokémon is shaped like ancient text characters. Although research is ongoing, it is a mystery as to which came first, the ancient writings or the various _____.
Because different types of _____ exist, it is said that they must have a variety of abilities.
